rows.label: tlk42350143_01_msg0001
rows.name:
We at Kurolo are discussing
how to buy the shop's
products more cheaply, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_01_msg0002
rows.name:
We're thinking tirelessly
for the poor people living
in Torika Alley, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_01_msg0003
rows.name:
The current method is to
stimulate the economy, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_01_msg0004
rows.name:
If everyone buys a lot, then
demand will increase, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_01_msg0005
rows.name:
Then, mass production will begin,
mo. And with mass production, the
unit price will drop, mo.

rows.label: tlk42350143_01_msg0007
rows.name:
Shopping develops the country, and as
the country develops, products become
cheaper! That's how it works, mo!
